title: Fanfic Writer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, Investigate a player, learning whether or not their role has flavor text.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are the only player visiting a target, you may read their flavor text.
- Framed players have the flavor text of the framing role.

desc:
